title: Shinigami no Ballad. (Momo, Girl God of Death)
synopsis: A girl wrapped in white, her name is Momo...in her hand lies a blunt yet shiny scythe. By her side is a winged black cat by the name of Daniel. Carrying the souls of humans, the girl's existence parallels to that of a "Death God" or "Shinigami". At the instant when this white Death God touches the hearts of humans, the world is filled with kindness and grief...
voices: ['Kobayashi, Akiko', 'Shimizu, Ai', 'Kaida, Yuki', 'Toyonaga, Toshiyuki', 'Saitou, Chiwa', 'Yaguchi, Asami', 'Kanada, Aki', 'Kimura, Akiko']
